name: Fotki Media Bot
author: FotkiAgency

sections.description:
Fotki Media Bot saves your media from your messenger chats or chat groups to WordPress Media Library.
Fotki Media Bot currently supports only Telegram Messenger.
Also it creates daily posts in your Posts and puts your media there from your media which you send and receive on Telegram Messenger.

This plugin is in beta, please report to us any issues, we will try to take care of them.

Get Started

Very important! Fotki Media Bot requires that your site runs on HTTPS protocol. If your site still runs on HTTP, please contact your hosting provider for help to switch on HTTPS. You can read more about why switching to HTTPS is important: https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/security/encrypt-in-transit/why-https

Setting up Fotki Media Bot with Telegram Messenger:
1) Chat with BotFather on device where you have Telegram installed, and follow a few simple steps to create a new Bot. Copy to your clipboard a “token to access the HTTP API” (will be given to you in red color).
2) Go to “Fotki Media Bot” page in your WordPress admin, and paste token into a Token field, and press “Add Bot”.
3) Send “/setprivacy” command to BotFather using a Telegram and disable privacy (without this step, Fotki Media Bot will not be able to get media from your chats).

Now, you can send media to your Telegram Bot, and all media will be automatically saved into your WordPress. And you can add your Bot to your group chats as well!

  • code improvement

0.4

  • fixed minor bugs

0.3

  • added log for bots incoming messages, only for errors
  • improved instruction how to use the bot

0.2

  • improved instruction how to setup the bot
